name: Aeonium 'Sunburst'
desc: Among the loveliest of Aeoniums, award-winning 'Sunburst' is an evergreen succulent with large variegated rosettes, 6-8 in. across (15-20 cm), of fleshy, spoon-shaped leaves. Held on long bare stems, the leaves are a delightful combination of creamy yellow and green stripes and are adorned with coppery red tips when exposed to the sun.

name: Aloe polyphylla (Spiral Aloe)
desc: Absolutely fascinating, Aloe polyphylla (Spiral Aloe) is a compact evergreen succulent valued for its foliage arranged in a perfect spiral pattern. The fleshy gray-green leaves form a tight rosette that becomes a beautiful spiral, either clockwise or counterclockwise, as the plant ages. A plant can count up to 150 leaves geometrically arranged in 5 ranks.

name: Caladium 'Miss Muffet' (Angel Wings)
desc: Sun tolerant, Caladium 'Miss Muffet' (Angel Wings) is a tuberous perennial with lush, heart-shaped, chartreuse leaves adorned with dark pink freckles. The equally dark pink veins may bleed into the lime green background, adding further color contrast.

name: Dudleya pulverulenta (Chalk Liveforever)
desc: Long lived, Dudleya pulverulenta (Chalk Liveforever) is an evergreen succulent with charming rosettes, 12-18 in. wide (30-45 cm), of spoon-shaped, white to silver-gray leaves. The fleshy leaves are covered with a fine coat of white powder than can be rubbed off.

name: Echeveria pulidonis
desc: Slow-growing, Echeveria pulidonis is an evergreen succulent with stemless rosettes, 4-5 in. wide (10-12 cm), packed with over 25 fleshy, plump, slightly cupped, pale silvery-green leaves adorned with red edges and a delicate red tip.

name: Jasminum sambac (Arabian Jasmine)
desc: Used to flavor jasmine tea in China, award-winner Jasminum sambac (Arabian Jasmine) is a twining or scrambling evergreen shrub with glossy dark green leaves and exceptionally fragrant waxy pure-white flowers, 1 in. across (2.5 cm).

name: Nerium oleander 'Splendens' (Oleander)
desc: Tough and vigorous, Nerium oleander 'Splendens' (Oleander) is a spectacular evergreen shrub which produces an abundance of large clusters of fragrant, funnel-shaped, soft pink double flowers. Interestingly, some petals may display white streaks of freckles, adding further beauty to the plant.

name: Pelargonium peltatum 'Cascade Sofie' (Ivy Geranium)
desc: Pelargonium peltatum 'Cascade Sofie' (Ivy Geranium) is a compact, trailing, evergreen perennial with fleshy, deep green, ivy-shaped leaves on long lax stems. Single flowers adorned with 5 pink petals appear from spring through fall. Providing a summer of lush flowering, Ivy Geranium is a great addition to hanging baskets, window boxes and raised beds where it will cascade gracefully down, creating a waterfall effect. Heat-loving and low care.
